title: The Traitor in the Game
description: The sequel to explosive YA thriller A GAME OF LIFE OR DEATH: At the end of book one, Asha Kennedy (Lisbeth Salander for a new generation) uncovered the dark secret at the heart of Virtual Reality game 'Shackle' - You don't play the game; it plays you - and must now go deeper into a dangerous world of corruption and greed: who is the puppet master of the game and what is their ultimate goal?Set in New York, this is a whiplash-paced, twisty mystery and scorching romance where Asha's enemies may be closer than she could ever imagine...Perfect for fans of The Hunger Games and A Good Girl's Guide to MurderA guaranteed page turner full of heart, tension and twists you won't see coming!The second book in a major new YA series
author: Triona  Campbell
